title: 求助
txt_content: mv多世界怎么一个世界刷怪，另外一个不刷

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
/mv gamerule doMobSpawning false
在不想让刷怪的世界输入

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
刷怪的输入/gamerule doMobSpawning true
不刷怪的输入/gamerule doMobSpawning false在对应世界里输入

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content:
传送到对应的世界哦
然后输入
gamerule doMobSpawning true
推荐一个gamerule网址https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/命令/gamerule
采纳的话求最佳哦

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set monsters false
这样就会使得怪物不生成，动物正常生成。
